items.headline: You’ve just won the $1 billion Powerball jackpot. Here are the 5 money moves you need to make next.

items.headline: 72% of people say they’d be happier if they saved or invested more money. Far fewer said spending more would bring happiness.
items.summary_en: While financial happiness is typically framed as a choice between spending on material goods or spending on experiences, many Americans are expressing a different desire for their money: saving more.
